name: lalaz/scheduler
description: Task scheduling for Lalaz applications with cron-like syntax

install.message:
Scheduler installed!

Next steps:
1. Define tasks in config/scheduler.php
2. Add to your crontab:
   * * * * * cd /path/to/app && php lalaz schedule:run >> /dev/null 2>&1
3. View tasks: php lalaz schedule:list
4. Test a task: php lalaz schedule:test {task-name}
